summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6187 for the construction of a trunk sanitary sewer system together with an outfall sewer known as the Delridge Trunk Sewer, under Ordinance No. 87249, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
